bibl.title: Posidippus and the Mysteries: Epitymbia Read by the Ancient Historian.
Labored in Papyrus Leaves: Perspectives on an Epigram Collection Attributed to Posidippus (P. Mil. Vogl. VIII 309)
bibl.author: DIGNAS, Beate

bibl.note: P. Mil. Vogl. VIII, 309, coll. vii, 10-x, 6 = 42-61 Austin-Bastianini. - Grave Inscriptions - Grave Epigrams. - Posidippus' Epitymbia.
DIGNAS Beate, Posidippus and the Mysteries: Epitymbia Read by the Ancient Historian.

Benjamin ACOSTA-HUGHES, Elizabeth KOSMETATOU and Manuel BAUMBACH (Edd.), Labored in Papyrus Leaves: Perspectives on an Epigram Collection Attributed to Posidippus (P. Mil. Vogl. VIII 309) = Hellenic Studies. 2 (Washington, D.C. - Cambridge, Mass. - London, 2004) pp. 177-186.
